column6:
The Russians are coming! The Russians are coming! Get ready to cry "Wolverine!" at the top of your lungs, 'cause Avengers Tower is about to go all "Red Dawn" when the Crimson Dynamo invades! But who is the super-spy on the armored villain's trail...and can she be trusted? ,2008,2
All Ages...$2.99
column8: | artist:Ig Guara | penciller (cover):Leonard Kirk | inker:Norman Lee | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Marc Sumerak
